recipes.label: Flotsam
recipes.startdescription: Our look out spots something bobbing on the waves, too angular to be a seal. There seems to be some floating debris, potentially the cargo of another ship.

recipes.label: Treasures amids Trash
recipes.startdescription: Something of value could be salvaged. We take on board what we can.

recipes.label: Half-digested Refuse
recipes.startdescription: We cannot find anything of worth amids the broken planks and debris. We leave the sea to her meal.
